title: Shop is now OPEN!
description:
Exciting news – our online store is now open, right on time for your holiday shopping spree! Check it out here.

Planning to surprise your loved ones? Make sure to place your orders by December 15th for economy shipping, or by December 20th if you are opting for expedited shipping. Plus, all orders are prepped and primed for gifting – making your holiday surprises even more special!
